quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to go east. Then, pick up the latchkey from the shelf. After you have got the latchkey, deposit the latchkey on the floor of the workshop. And once you've done that, you win!

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can make out a chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a shelf. The shelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the shelf you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a washroom.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You're now in the cookhouse.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cubicle.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a shower.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a garage. A typical one.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You arrive in a laundromat. A typical kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can see a Henderson's limited edition safe. Huh, weird.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The Henderson's limited edition safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Henderson's limited edition safe is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a playroom. A normal kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You smell a terrible smell, and follow it to a safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a restroom. A normal kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. A normal kind of place.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a formless box.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The formless box contains [a list of things in the c_3]. A formless box... Is that really what you were looking for?[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The formless box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You make out a locker. Is this what you came to TextWorld for? This... locker?[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: passageway
infos.desc: it's a sturdy passageway [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: it's a well-built portal [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: hatch
infos.desc: it is what it is, a hatch [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to crack open. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: Henderson's limited edition safe
infos.desc: The Henderson's limited edition safe looks strong, and impossible to break open. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to bash open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: formless box
infos.desc: The formless box looks strong, and impossible to bash open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: locker
infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to bash open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: licorice strip
infos.desc: that's a typical licorice strip!

infos.name: loaf of bread
infos.desc: that's a normal loaf of bread!

infos.name: passkey
infos.desc: The passkey is cold to the touch

infos.name: shirt
infos.desc: The shirt is antiquated.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is solidly built.

infos.name: sandwich
infos.desc: The sandwich looks savory.

infos.name: legume
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: peanut
infos.desc: that's a normal peanut!

infos.name: durian
infos.desc: that's an usual durian!

infos.name: Henderson's limited edition keycard
infos.desc: The Henderson's limited edition keycard is cold to the touch

infos.name: formless passkey
infos.desc: The formless passkey looks useful

infos.name: desktop computer
infos.desc: The desktop computer appears to be to fit in here

infos.name: sponge
infos.desc: The sponge is modern.

infos.name: pillow
infos.desc: The pillow is expensive looking.

infos.name: teaspoon
infos.desc: The teaspoon looks well matched to everything else here

infos.name: key
infos.desc: The metal of the key is hammered.

infos.name: latchkey
infos.desc: The metal of the latchkey is antiqued.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First, it would be fantastic if you could venture east. Next, pick up the latchkey from the shelf. After that, throw the latchkey on the floor of the workshop. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

main_quest.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First, it would be fantastic if you could venture east. Next, pick up the latchkey from the shelf. After that, throw the latchkey on the floor of the workshop. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
